name: f_gl_balance__mnp
description: This table stores the general ledger balances for various accounts, products, and currencies, including both original and local currency balances.

columns.name: cob_date
columns.description: The date at which the balance is reported.

columns.name: sif
columns.description: A unique identifier for the system or source of the data.

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account.

columns.name: product_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the product.

columns.name: ccy_code
columns.description: The three-letter code representing the currency.

columns.name: gl_code
columns.description: The code representing the general ledger account.

columns.name: account_address
columns.description: The address associated with the account.

columns.name: gl_org_bal
columns.description: The original currency balance details, including balance type, credit and debit quantities.

columns.name: gl_lcy_bal
columns.description: The local currency balance details, including balance type, credit and debit quantities.

columns.name: sbv_code
columns.description: A code used for supervisory or regulatory purposes.

columns.name: branch_code
columns.description: The code representing the branch where the account is held.

columns.name: dlh_created_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the record was created.

columns.name: dlh_partition_date
columns.description: The date used for partitioning the data.

columns.name: dlh_source
columns.description: The source from which the data was obtained.

columns.name: dlh_processed_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the record was processed.

columns.name: year
columns.description: The year part of the date.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The month part of the date.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The day part of the date.
